data.title: Trilogy Health Services, LLC
data.meta_description: Discover the perfect senior living community that offers the level of care to fit your needs. Find a community and schedule your tour today!
data.text:
Trilogy Health Services

Welcome! We’re so happy that you’re here!

Whether you’re looking for one of our 130+ senior living communities in Ohio, Kentucky, Indiana, Michigan, or Wisconsin—or just typed in “senior living near me”—learn more about everything Trilogy has to offer.

Independent Living, Assisted Living, Memory Care, Skilled Services

Senior Living Services

Comprehensive On-Site Care Services

We’ll meet you with the appropriate level of care wherever you are—whether you’re fully independent or looking for additional assistance.

Independent Living

Welcome to your new “good old days.”

Because who doesn’t miss living across the street from their closest friends? Discover the joys of our maintenance-free independent living communities and leave the upkeep to us. After all, you probably have a cookout to get to.

Our Independent Living services may include:

Private apartments and/or villas

Housekeeping and ground maintenance

Meal plan options with restaurant-style dining

Scheduled outings and activities

Laundry service where available

and so much more!

Assisted Living

Leave the busy work to us.

When you think about your best years, what do you imagine? Scheduling appointments? Managing medications? Taking care of chores?

We don’t either. That’s where Assisted Living services come in.

Our Assisted Living services include:

Your own private suite/apartment

Assistance with activities of daily living

Licensed nurses available 24/7

Medication administration or assistance

Social services available as needed

and more!

Memory Care

Celebrate your story.

When it comes to navigating memory loss, we treat our residents with the same love and dignity that we would expect for our own loved ones. That means being by their side to flip through their favorite scrapbook and then filling up the blank pages with pictures of their new best friends.

Our Memory Care services include:

Private, personalized suites

24-hour emergency alert assistance

Daily Rhythms programming that offers consistent engagement from morning until night

Our Best Friends Approach, which provides residents with companions who fully understand their life story

Fulfilling activities that stimulate the mind and make room for socialization

Safe, secure courtyards

and more!

Adult Day Services

Take the spa day.

As a caregiver, it’s important to remember to take time for yourself. With our Adult Day services, we’ll provide your loved one with top-quality care so that you can take the break you deserve – whether you’re running errands or just taking a moment for yourself.

Our Adult Day services include:

Access to all programs and amenities

Opportunities for socialization

Support and education programs

Health monitoring

No minimum stay

Meals 3x daily

and more!

Skilled Services

Get back to feeling your best.

Everyone needs a helping hand sometimes. Whether you’re recovering from a fall or just looking for a short-term stay, our team of clinical experts will help you feel better than ever, just in time for the next community trip.

Our Skilled Services include:

Rehab services, including physical, occupational, and speech-language pathology

Case management and/or social services

24-Hour Skilled Nursing care

Pharmacy and laboratory

Radiology

and more!

Dialysis

A different approach to Dialysis.

Whether you’re here for a short-term or a long-term stay, we’re proud to offer Trilogy Dialysis to the seniors who call qualifying campuses home. Our hemodialysis services make use of the state-of-the-art Ascent medical recliner, offering top-of-the-line healing and massage options to any resident who might need them. We also accept health center and community admissions – promising them the same one-on-one care with Trilogy nurses and patient care technicians that our residents have come to expect.

Amenities include:

Ascent medical recliner

Private treatment bays with windows and natural light

Floor-to-ceiling glass paneling at each bay

Personal TV

Free Wi-Fi

Pharmacy & Lab

Synchrony Pharmacy

As a senior living provider, we understand that caring for the whole person means supporting all aspects of their health and well-being. This is why we’re proud to partner with Synchrony Health Services to offer our post-acute residents both pharmacy and rehabilitative care. By doing so, we can ensure that they receive the best clinical care available, right in the comfort of their own home.

mission, vision, & values

Who we are.

Put some coffee on, grab a heated blanket, and enjoy learning about our continuous journey of becoming the Best Healthcare Company in the Midwest.

culture

We care for them while they care for others.

Our team members deserve more than just pizza parties – they deserve apprenticeship programs, scholarship opportunities, and career pathways that are just unique as they are.

philosophy

A Provider of Award-Winning Care.

If you were to tour a Trilogy campus, you’d probably hear about our full continuum of care. More than just a marketing phrase, this is our pledge to you that all of the services you could ever need will be accessible from one convenient location—the community you call home.
